title: Shardana Cucina Vegetariana and Vineria
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Buffet, Beer/Wine
description: Vegetarian restaurant and winery located in an old house, Terrana, surrounded by nature. Offers a plant-based menu which includes fresh pasta and biological as well as the bread of timilia (ancient Sicilian wheat) and vegetables as the vital ingredients. Furnishings are from local sources. Happy hour, Thursday music, theme nights Sardinian cuisine, beer festival in October. Bike and dog friendly.
